name: Coffee for Zombies
description:
Turn zombies into happy coffee drinkers before time expires.

"P" to Play.  "Q' to Quit.

Avoid zombies!  One touch and you die

Pick up a coffee mug and serve it to a zombie and they turn into a happy coffee drinker!

Create all happy coffee drinkers before time expires to win.

WASD to move around.  

Space Bar to Jump.

Resources

Animation and Some Meshes - Mixamo.com

Zombie Mesh - MakeHuman

Particle Effects- Flames of the Phoenix

Environment - CITY package - 3D Modells
